about.title: Who We Are
about.text1: Magnum Technology specializes in advanced technology and automation systems. Our expertise drives measurable results for clients across diverse industries.
about.text2: We deliver comprehensive engineering solutions through innovative design methodologies and rigorous quality standards. Our commitment to precision and functionality ensures optimal performance for every client engagement.

services.title: Engineering Services
services.subtitle: Advanced Virtual Engineering & Competitive Manufacturing Solutions

items.assembly: Assembly line systems and automated components

projects.title: PROJECT SAMPLES

contact.text: Magnum Technology delivers comprehensive engineering solutions that meet stringent industry standards and client specifications across multiple technical disciplines.

aboutPage.title: ABOUT US
aboutPage.text1: Magnum Technology specializes in customized engineering solutions through rigorous technical analysis and precision manufacturing methodologies.
aboutPage.text2: Our engineering teams deliver comprehensive design solutions that meet stringent industry standards and client specifications across multiple sectors.

strengths.assessment: Conduct comprehensive technical assessments through strategic collaboration with client organizations at executive and operational levels
strengths.solutions: Design and develop engineering solutions with complete technical documentation, including precision drawings and manufacturing specifications
strengths.oversight: Provide technical oversight and engineering support throughout the production lifecycle to ensure quality standards
strengths.coordination: Direct subcontractor coordination and project management to ensure timely delivery and technical compliance
strengths.discipline: Maintain rigorous project discipline with systematic organization, precision execution, and clear stakeholder communication

qualificationsList.master: Master of Science: Virtual Engineering and Competitive Manufacturing
qualificationsList.bachelor: Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering: Machine Building

aboutPage.globalText: Romania (Cluj, Sibiu, Oradea, Bistrița, Bucharest), United Kingdom, Austria, Spain, China, UAE
aboutPage.partnersText: Emerson, Accenture, Bosch, NTT, ULMA Packaging, TURBOMECANICA, CSi Romania, GRUPO PACADAR, Tehnosteel Industry SRL, Bertrandt Group

portfolioPage.title: PORTFOLIO
portfolioPage.subtitle: Magnum Technology has established strategic partnerships with industry clients to deliver comprehensive engineering solutions that drive operational excellence and measurable performance improvements. Our portfolio demonstrates technical precision, systematic engineering methodologies, and strict adherence to international quality standards across all project deliverables.

assembly.title: Assembly Line Station
assembly.description: Precision-engineered automated assembly systems designed for optimal manufacturing throughput and quality assurance.

quality.title: Quality Verification System
quality.description: Advanced metrology and inspection systems ensuring compliance with stringent industry specifications and regulatory requirements.

material.title: Material Handling
material.description: Integrated material transport systems engineered for seamless workflow optimization and operational efficiency.

plc.description: Advanced Siemens PLC programming and industrial automation solutions for complex manufacturing environments.

educational.title: Educational Solutions
educational.description: Professional training systems and educational automation platforms for technical skill development and certification programs.

tooling.description: Precision-manufactured fixtures and specialized tooling solutions designed for enhanced productivity and dimensional accuracy.
